name: Somewhat Simple
description: Ah Doom2 Map 7. My favorite Doom2 map to DM on. After DMing on a DWANGO version of this map and then listening to the Kinkiness remix of this song, I decided to make my own version of the map ripe for DM. I figured since I hadn't touched the sloping abilities of ZDoom, this would be a great place to start. So please enjoy!
